task.comment: ex1b.xml is not valid, because (description, number, remark) doesnâ€™t appear in the same exact sequence in one of the row elements

ex2a.xml is not valid, because one of the house elements has more than 1 remark element, but at most it should have either 0 or 1. Also, one of the district elements does not have at least 1 street element.
ex3b.xml is not valid, because nbsp entity was not declared
ex3c.xml is not valid, because ampersand character was not declared
ex5a.xml is not valid, because id references does not exist
ex6a.xml is not valid, because element "term" doesn't have the right children element
ex8b.xml is not valid, because one of the "company" elements doesn't have the required "personid" attribute.
ex10b.xml is not valid, because the sequece of (place, date, partner) is mixed
ex11b.xml is not valid, because the the element "psnr" is missing
ex12a.xml is not valid, because "comment" element value is not integer
ex13a.xml is not valid, because "tutorial-day" element value is not correct, 3 chars instead of 2.
ex14a.xml is not valid, because "vehicle" element types are not mentioned and can't inherit some specific children elements
ex15a.xml is not valid, because grade value exceeds specified range
ex16b.xml is not valid, because "person" element value "funny" is not allowed
ex17b.xml is not valid, because "assessment" element value "crazy" is not allowed
